001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.dsl.js;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
004import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.RpcConfig;
005import org.slf4j.Logger;
006import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
007
008import javax.script.ScriptException;
009import java.io.File;
010import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
011import java.net.URI;
012
013/**
014 * Demo of using bitcoinj DSL for JavaScript
015 */
016public class Demo {
017    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Demo.class);
018
019    public static void main(String[] args) throws ScriptException, FileNotFoundException {
020        var file = new File(args[0]);
021        if (!file.exists()) {
022            System.err.println("File not found: " + file);
023            System.exit(-1);
024        }
025
026        var rpcConfig = new RpcConfig(BitcoinNetwork.MAINNET,  // Network to connect to
027                URI.create("http://localhost:8332"),        // RPC Server URL
028                "bitcoinrpc",                      // RPC Server username
029                "pass");                           // RPC Server password
030        var runner = new ScriptRunner(rpcConfig);
031        runner.evalFile(file);
032    }
033}
